name: Luna and the Stars
summary: In the game players control the level headed and kind Luna as she rescues her friends from Soleil. Soleil is tired of humans writing more poetry and songs about the night sky than the sun- so she's stolen the stars brought about eternal daylight! It's up to Luna to restore the beauty of the night sky and save her starry friends. You must avoid Soleil's fiery wrath while collecting stars in order to regain your magic and take her down.
